summary: Rapidly changing maritime threats compel the Navy to deliver ships faster. But the Navy falls short on design practices that reduce leading companies' shipbuilding time. title: Navy Shipbuilding: Increased Use of Leading Design Practices Could Improve Timeliness of Deliveries
